text: • Closely match categories on Survey of Earned Doctorates: • Education, government, private-for-profit organizations, not-for-profit organizations, self-employed (with more detail within each of these categories) • For jobs in higher education: • • Need to encourage departments to share data with Graduate School and report data in consistent format Thank You! Questions? • Questions, Comments? • rebecca.hatch@tufts.edu • A copy of this presentation will be uploaded to the Tufts OIRE website (and to NEAIR's website) • http://provost.tufts.edu/institutionalresearch/
